means: 耶和华（犹太教神名的基督教读法）

sentence.Network_en: This is hateful to Jehovah, who will certainly punish the land.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是耶和华所厌恶的, 他必须降祸于这块土地.

sentence.Network_en: And Jehovah said to Satan, Where have you come from?
sentence.Network_cn: 2耶和华问撒但说, 你从那里来?

sentence.Network_en: One of the creatures Jehovah created , the Cardinal claims , was Agonistes.
sentence.Network_cn: 主教提到,其中的一件作品就是阿冈尼司帝斯.

PerfectNetExp.abs: jehovah 上帝, jehovah 耶和华, jehovah 怎样

list.abs: 这城的名字要称为耶和华沙玛（Jehovah Shammah）——耶和华的所在。这名字叫我们记得常存在神心里的是什麽事情：神极爱祂所 …
耶和华沙马(Jehovah Shammah) 耶和华的所在（同在）（结48：35）
almighty jehovah - presentation transcript ., 万军之耶和华.
with what shall I come before jehovah and bow myself before the high god ?我朝见耶和华，在至高神面前跪拜，该带来什么呢？
jehovah promised peace all over the world ., 耶和华应许天下太平.

entry.tran: 耶和华（《圣经·旧约》中对上帝的称呼）
entry.def: Jehovah is the name given to God in the Old Testament.

means.word_mean: 1. a name for the God of the Old Testament as transliterated from the Hebrew consonants YHVH
2. terms referring to the Judeo-Christian God
